projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: A responsive personal portfolio website built with modern web technologies.

projects.name: SparkUI
projects.description: A web-based interface developed for the SparkMaker FHD 3D printer, enabling remote control and monitoring capabilities.

projects.name: NestPad
projects.description: A client-side to-do list application featuring nested task organization with local storage capabilities for list persistence.

projects.name: Meer
projects.description: An Android application that simplifies location sharing by converting GPS coordinates into shareable Google Maps links.

projects.name: LibGPS
projects.description: A Kotlin-based Android library that streamlines GPS functionality and permission handling for developers.

projects.name: ArcadeRCS
projects.description: A remote control system for home arcade cabinets that manages game selection and boot sequences.

projects.name: IIDXCon
projects.description: An Arduino-based solution that emulates specialized gaming input hardware through custom firmware.

projects.name: BitPocket
projects.description: A Kotlin application that generates and monitors Bitcoin wallet addresses for balance changes.

projects.name: Road Fighters 3D Shader
projects.description: A custom ReShade shader that converts interlaced video output to Red/Cyan 3D format.

projects.name: TegraAutoSmash
projects.description: A Nintendo Switch homebrew utility that automates payload injection upon PC connection.
